info.name: Kongregate Dark Theme
info.description:
90%+ Complete.
Makes the website Kongregate dark. Recolors almost all pages to a smooth dark theme that doesn't hurt the eyes.

Note: I can't recolor Google ads.
info.additionalInfo:
05/06 - Some forum fixes/improvements
30/05 - Fixed some backgrounds and arrows
29/04 - Added forum and comment pages and more elements.
